==Abilities==
{{Enemy Attacks
|name_1 = Corrosion
|desc_1 = The Golden Wolflord is capable of inflicting stacks of [[Corrosion]] with its attacks.

|name_2 = Laser Beam
|desc_2 = The Golden Wolflord fires a laser beam from its mouth, raking across the arena twice, rapidly dealing '''50% ATK''' as {{Color|Geo DMG}} to players caught in the beam. Repeated hits will have their DMG reduced according to its [[Damage Sequence]].

|name_3 = Ramming Attack
|desc_3 = The Golden Wolflord charges across the arena 3 times in a row, dealing '''50% ATK''' as {{Color|Geo DMG}} on hit. The Golden Wolflord will be stunned after this attack.

|name_4 = Skull Rain
|desc_4 = The Golden Wolflord spews out a large number of corroded skulls from its mouth, which home towards the player, each dealing '''25% ATK''' as {{Color|Geo DMG}} on impact.

|name_5 = Sweep
|desc_5 = Sweeps the surrounding area with its tail twice, dealing '''50% ATK''' as {{Color|Geo DMG}} each time.

|name_6 = Void Barrier
|desc_6 = After reaching '''70%''' of its Max [[HP]], gains a Void Barrier which grants immunity to all DMG. Then, uses '''Earthshaking Dive''' and '''Tornado'''.

|name_7 = Earthshaking Dive
|desc_7 = Flies up and dives into the ground with great force, dealing '''100% ATK''' as {{Color|Geo DMG}} in a massive area covering the majority of the arena. After it resurfaces, 9 massive explosions will follow that again cover the majority of the arena, each dealing '''25% ATK''' as {{Color|Geo DMG}}. This attack is only performed while the Wolflord is in the Elemental Devourer state.

|name_8 = Tornado
|desc_8 = The Golden Wolflord generates a massive tornado in the center of the arena, which deals no DMG. Additionally, the Void Barrier becomes vulnerable during this attack: On hit, regular attacks damage the barrier by '''0.5%''', [[Nightsoul]]-aligned attacks damage the barrier by '''1.5%'''. The player's Saurian companion also gains a special attack from this point on, which deals '''4000% ATK''' as {{Color|Geo DMG}} and damages the barrier by '''40%'''. When the Void Barrier is broken, the Golden Wolflord is stunned, and will take '''35% Max HP''' as {{Color|True Physical DMG}}.
|file_8_2 = Abyss-Corroded Golden Wolflord Tornado 2
|caption_8_2 = Stunned
|file_8_3 = Abyss-Corroded Golden Wolflord Tornado 3
|caption_8_3 = Saurian Companion's Special Attack
}}
